data.actual_result: Keyboard flashes for a second or maybe a bit longer
data.expected_result: Keyboard should stay on the dark mode color
data.short_description: gboard flashes when clicking the send message button (iOS 12) (darkmode Discord only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Be on iOS 12 - Install gboard (default settings should do) - Open any place where you can send a message - Type your message - Click the send button
